front.title: Sieve Extensions: MIME Tests, MIME Bodypart Iteration, Replacement and Enclosure

abstract.t: The current Sieve language has no way to look at individual MIME parts, looping mechanism, or any way to manipulate those individual parts. This document defines extensions for each of these needs. This document is being discussed in the MTA-FILTERS mailing lists, ietf-mta-filters@imc.org.
